Weber Holding Annual Report 2025

Dear Shareholders,

We are pleased to report another successful year. Our company achieved 
total revenues of 77,364,773 CHF, representing growth from the 
previous year. After accounting for direct costs of 46,828,281 CHF,
our gross profit reached 30,536,492 CHF.

Operating expenses, including personnel and administrative costs, totaled
12,168,303 CHF, leaving us with operating income of 
18,368,189 CHF. After interest payments of 3,057,722 CHF
and taxes, our net profit for the year was 12,704,748 CHF.

Our balance sheet remains strong with total assets of 57,990,152 CHF.
Current assets amount to 36,574,862 CHF. On the liability side,
we have current liabilities of 18,826,405 CHF and long-term 
debt of 8,576,651 CHF. Shareholders' equity stands at 
30,587,095 CHF.

Management Team
Weber Holding

Wagner Systems Annual Report 2025

Dear Shareholders,

We are pleased to report another successful year. Our company achieved 
total revenues of 76,917,726 CHF, representing growth from the 
previous year. After accounting for direct costs of 54,602,888 CHF,
our gross profit reached 22,314,839 CHF.

Operating expenses, including personnel and administrative costs, totaled
14,031,326 CHF, leaving us with operating income of 
8,283,513 CHF. After interest payments of 2,514,362 CHF
and taxes, our net profit for the year was 4,561,293 CHF.

Our balance sheet remains strong with total assets of 64,705,813 CHF.
Current assets amount to 36,391,042 CHF. On the liability side,
we have current liabilities of 16,636,413 CHF and long-term 
debt of 14,892,099 CHF. Shareholders' equity stands at 
33,177,301 CHF.

Management Team
Wagner Systems

Fischer & Co Annual Report 2025

Dear Shareholders,

We are pleased to report another successful year. Our company achieved 
total revenues of 41,874,538 CHF, representing growth from the 
previous year. After accounting for direct costs of 28,402,401 CHF,
our gross profit reached 13,472,136 CHF.

Operating expenses, including personnel and administrative costs, totaled
7,291,495 CHF, leaving us with operating income of 
6,180,642 CHF. After interest payments of 891,974 CHF
and taxes, our net profit for the year was 4,460,716 CHF.

Our balance sheet remains strong with total assets of 44,814,192 CHF.
Current assets amount to 9,253,844 CHF. On the liability side,
we have current liabilities of 7,557,963 CHF and long-term 
debt of 7,948,208 CHF. Shareholders' equity stands at 
29,308,021 CHF.

Management Team
Fischer & Co

Meyer Technical Annual Report 2025

Dear Shareholders,

We are pleased to report another successful year. Our company achieved 
total revenues of 91,717,490 CHF, representing growth from the 
previous year. After accounting for direct costs of 54,292,810 CHF,
our gross profit reached 37,424,680 CHF.

Operating expenses, including personnel and administrative costs, totaled
22,139,200 CHF, leaving us with operating income of 
15,285,480 CHF. After interest payments of 1,902,559 CHF
and taxes, our net profit for the year was 10,827,245 CHF.

Our balance sheet remains strong with total assets of 82,834,485 CHF.
Current assets amount to 33,466,514 CHF. On the liability side,
we have current liabilities of 16,651,172 CHF and long-term 
debt of 25,129,890 CHF. Shareholders' equity stands at 
41,053,423 CHF.

Management Team
Meyer Technical
